name: mno's Multi-Play Minigame Mega Pack (Trial Version)
name_original: mno's Multi-Play Minigame Mega Pack (Trial Version)
description:
as usual for my timing on jam submissions this game is, despite being intended to be bad on purpose, actually unfinished and lacks audio which I will probably be adding in an update very soon.

I'll also figure out what to actually write here in better detail. anyways this game is designed to be obtuse and frustrating so just be aware of that before you play
